summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Discord Radio Bot fourth iteration. All backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate). Frontend fully functional with audio player, bot statistics cards, genre filters, and proper German localization. Previous 3 iterations' fixes maintained successfully.

minor_issues.issue: Station audio playback may be restricted by browser autoplay policies
minor_issues.note: Clicking stations triggers audio player UI, but actual audio playback depends on browser permissions

passed_tests: Backend API /api/bots returns bots with statistics fields (servers, users, connections, listeners)
Backend API /api/stations returns 11 stations with url field for audio playback
Backend API /api/stats returns correct bot and station counts
Backend API /api/commands returns Discord commands with German descriptions
Frontend Hero section displays 'Dreh die Lautstärke auf' with German umlauts
Frontend Bot cards show 'BOT STATISTIKEN' section with Server, Nutzer, Verbindungen, Zuhörer
Frontend Bot cards display bot avatar images (/img/bot-N.png)
Frontend Stations are clickable for audio playback with visual feedback
Frontend Station description says 'Klicke zum Vorhören oder nutze /play im Discord'
Frontend Genre filter buttons visible (Electronic/Festival, Lo-Fi/Chill, Rock/Classic, Chill/Ambient, Dance/EDM, Hip Hop/Rap, Techno/House, Pop/Charts, Rock/Alternative, Bass/Dubstep, Deutsch Rap)
Frontend Genre tags shown on all station cards
Frontend Features section contains 'Unbegrenzt skalierbar' as 6th feature
Frontend Navigation works correctly between sections (Bots, Features, Stationen, Commands)
Frontend Station search filtering functional with 'Station suchen...' placeholder
Frontend Shows correct statistics: 11 stations, 4 bots
